name: Relationships of the Heart Conference/Workshop
content: Nancy Watta is the founder and leader of the Relationships of the Heart Conference/Workshop. Nancy travels outside the USA leading the conference for groups of leaders in diverse cultural settngs. From large cities, to villages, we all struggle with relationships. The Relatonship Conference assists men and women leaders navigage through their world of reltationships in three areas of the life of a christian leader. 1- Our Relationships with Jesus Christ 2- Our Relationship in community with other believers. 3- The Heartbeat of Jesus, Reaching Others. This conference/workshop is an interactive conference/workshop. It includes group discussion, illustrations, stories, volunteer opportunities, learner guide for notes. To connect with Nancy with yoru questions, go to the website listed in this event announcement and fill out the contact form to connet with Nancy. We have 48 seats availble for this conference.
